# ChorusFruit2

### A Cool and New TUI Framework
+ Easy to Use

+ Object Orianted

+ Color Support

## Easy to Use

For Example This Code Prints a Blue and Bold Text:

```py
from ChorusFruit2 import Terminal
terminal = Terminal()
print("This Text is [BLUE][BOLD]Blue and Bold")
```

### Usage:
To Make an TUI!
